title: slidece
author: slidece
content: Any Bounty designer in the house please share Telegram along with portfolio (Bounty designs only) and pricing.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Maybe my understanding is wrong that "bounty" means you wanna pay a designer with your token, because you have to pay in bitcoin or another bluechip altcoin if you wanna get a decent designer. Well, find your talent in this thread, https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406507.0just check their rates in their respective ann thread. I recommend @jayce in this case

comments.author: Freedom4All
comments.body: Hi.What exactly are you looking for?I do not fully understand what you are looking for. What I dó know is that I am a very good designer.You don´t accept PM´s shows a message.So if still in need, give me your Skype details.Or take mine:live:.cid.5f5381fd5f144096Or let me know another way to contact you.
